IXO RAM688 Ford Fiesta RS WRC 2018 Rally Catalunya – Costa Daurada DNF K. Block/A. Gelsomino



Ken Block made his WRC return at the 2018 Rally Catalunya, four years after his last appearance on the mixed-surface rally, competing under his own Hoonigan Racing Division banner. This was Block’s 25th - and to date, final - WRC start since he made his debut at the sport's top level in 2007. Block and Gelsomino started in 33rd place and by stage 6 were up to 22nd. Unfortunately, Block crashed out on the stage ending their rally.
